description: This file defines a set of functions that interact with a REST API for managing chat rooms/groups, messages, and members in a chat application. It includes functions for listing chats, creating chats, listing messages, sending messages, listing members, adding members, and removing members.

methods.name: listChats(token)
methods.description: Lists chats/groups for the current user by calling the GET /chats endpoint.

methods.name: createChat(token, { name, memberEmails })
methods.description: Creates a new group chat with specified name and optional member emails by calling the POST /chats endpoint.

methods.name: listMessages(token, chatId)
methods.description: Lists messages for a specific chat identified by chatId by calling GET /chats/{chatId}/messages.

methods.name: sendMessage(token, chatId, { text })
methods.description: Sends a message to a specific chat identified by chatId by calling POST /chats/{chatId}/messages with message text.

methods.name: listMembers(token, chatId)
methods.description: Lists members of a specific chat identified by chatId by calling GET /chats/{chatId}/members.

methods.name: addMember(token, chatId, { email })
methods.description: Adds a member to a chat by email, calling POST /chats/{chatId}/members.

methods.name: removeMember(token, chatId, userId)
methods.description: Removes a member from a chat by userId, calling DELETE /chats/{chatId}/members/{userId}.
